entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then steady.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 in the evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
